Sinks beside Jackie as she weeps and pleads for her to answer him, showing emotional concern and sincerity.
Expresses a sincere desire to marry and take care of Jackie despite acknowledging his own flaws.
Fails to persuade Jackie and struggles to elicit a response from her.
Shows emotional persistence by continuing to talk to Jackie and urging her to answer him.
Expresses vulnerability and emotional pain, admits he doesn't trust anyone but Jackie, quietly cries on her shoulder.
Attempts to persuade Jackie not to leave or confront Lester, pleads with her to stay or not go down the hill.
Passively watches Jackie leave and later observes her with Lester, makes no direct move or intervention.
